statements: UPDATE financial_data SET earnings_report = 'Quarter 1 Report', balance_sheet = 'Q1 Balance' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE financial_data SET balance_sheet = 'Q2 Balance', earnings_report = 'Quarter 2 Report' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE financial_data SET balance_sheet = '2022 Q1 Balance Sheet' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE financial_data SET earnings_report = '2022 Q1 Earnings Report', balance_sheet = '2022 Q1 Balance Sheet' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE earnings_reports SET revenue = 5000.00, expenses = 3000.00, net_income = 2000.00 WHERE report_id = '08cb23e3-65c6-4f4c-847f-73a6cb5da722';
UPDATE balance_sheets SET assets = 80000.00, liabilities = 60000.00, equity = 20000.00 WHERE sheet_id = 'e766d30b-1bd1-4d2c-8a27-2dd119f2c547';
UPDATE earnings_reports SET net_income = net_income + 5000, expenses = expenses - 2000 WHERE report_date = '2022-01-31' AND company_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE balance_sheets SET liabilities = assets * 0.3, equity = assets * 0.7 WHERE company_id = '456e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND sheet_date = '2022-02-28';
UPDATE earnings_reports SET earnings = 50000 WHERE report_title = 'Q3 Earnings Report';
UPDATE balance_sheets SET total_assets = 1500000, total_liabilities = 800000, total_equity = 700000 WHERE company_name = 'XYZ Corp';
UPDATE earnings_reports SET earnings = 25000.00 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE balance_sheets SET total_assets = 500000.00, total_liabilities = 200000.00, total_equity = 300000.00 WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp' AND report_date = '2022-01-01';
UPDATE earnings_reports SET revenue = 15000.00, net_income = 10000.00 WHERE company_name = 'Company A'
UPDATE financial_reports SET financial_data = '{"ratio": 1.5, "growth": 0.10}' WHERE report_id = 12345
UPDATE earnings_reports SET revenue = 15000.67 WHERE company_name = 'ABC Inc' AND report_date = '2022-05-10';
UPDATE balance_sheets SET total_assets = 250000, total_liabilities = 100000, total_equity = 150000 WHERE company_name = 'XYZ Corp' AND balance_date = '2022-04-30';
UPDATE earnings_reports SET earnings = 15000.00 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE balance_sheets SET liabilities = 7500.00, assets = 20000.00 WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp';
UPDATE earnings_reports SET earnings = 25000.50 WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp';
UPDATE financial_reports SET report_type = 'Quarterly' , report_content = 'Updated report content' WHERE company_name = 'XYZ Ltd' AND report_date = '2022-09-30';
